channel.title: .cfg files not found? but working on windows?
channel.description:
Hey, I run old dds-specz server and I get the following errors: jake@jake:~/2speced server$ bash run.sh Dds-specz v2 is now activated. npc.cfg: file not found. npcdrops.cfg: file not found. autospawn.cfg: file not found. item.cfg: file not found. globaldrops.cfg: file not found. doors.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found.
The strange thing is, the client

item.title: .cfg files not found? but working on windows?
item.dc:creator: @jakeandchase jakeandchase
item.description:
@jakeandchase wrote:

I’ve changed all the directories to:

try {
localBufferedReader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(“Data/config/” + paramString))

Would that work?

item.source: .cfg files not found? but working on windows?

item.title: .cfg files not found? but working on windows?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Check the directory from where the source tries to find the files. Maybe there names were changed or maybe the server is looking for them in the wrong spot. Adjust the directories in the source accordingly.
